headline: Here's Why You Should Retain Ventas Stock in Your Portfolio Now
summary: Rising healthcare spending and aging population aid VTR's senior housing operating portfolio. However, competitive market and tenant concentration remain risks.

headline: Ventas Reaches Mutually Beneficial Agreements with Brookdale Senior Living
summary: CHICAGO, December 19, 2024--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") today announced that it has reached mutually beneficial agreements with Brookdale Senior Living ("Brookdale") regarding all assets under the current Master Lease (the "Master Lease") between Ventas and Brookdale. The agreements provide a comprehensive, clear outcome for Ventas as it executes its strategy to drive profitable growth in its senior housing business. The Master Lease was previously set to expire on Decem

headline: State Of REITs: Recession To Recovery In 2025
summary: REITs surged 20% before the Fed's rate cuts but now face challenges. See why valuations, not fundamentals, are behind their 45% underperformance gap.
